lore.creationMyth: In the primordial age, the All-Father, an omnipotent deity, conjured the first celestial beings - the Dragons. These beings birthed stars as they roamed the formless void. However, they yearned for a world of their own, and the All-Father granted them this wish. Once terrestrial, they fashioned a vibrant world from the formless terrain. The All-Father sculpted another mighty race, the Giants, from the very stones of the earth. Recognizing their shared connection to the land, Dragons and Giants formed an alliance, shaping the continents and landscapes. With the advent of time, mortal races sprang from the Giants' blood, embodying the potential to mold the world. The All-Father granted them free will, enabling the creation of empires and the initiation of wars. The world, once under the harmonious rule of Dragons and Giants, splintered due to strife and conflict amongst these mortals.
lore.setting: Sequestered in the heart of a lush forest is the ancient dungeon of Eldrath's Sorrow. This relic, a testament to the time when Dragons and Giants held sway, was once a sacred proving ground for mortals see favor from these ancient beings. The once magnificent halls, adorned with intricate carvings and statues symbolizing the unity of Dragons and Giants, now lay derelict, ensnared by nature's reclaim. Yet, the dungeon remains a formidable fortress, housing monstrous creatures drawn to its lingering ancient energy. Traps lay waiting for the unsuspecting, ready to unleash their dormant wrath. Scholars and seekers of forgotten lore are drawn to Eldrath's Sorrow, hoping to uncover remnants of ancient artifacts and unlock secrets buried within its halls. Despite its decay, the dungeon's echoes of the past tell a tale of unity, conflict, and the unending struggle between darkness and light.

cards.instructions: Draw a card.
cards.title: Guide of the Lost
cards.flavorText: In the labyrinth of shadows, one must rely on whispers of the light.
cards.visualDescription: An explorer in weathered attire holds aloft a magical compass emitting a soft glow amidst a network of confusing tunnels.

cards.instructions: Discard a card.
cards.title: Relinquished Load
cards.flavorText: Only in releasing the unnecessary can we journey forward unburdened.
cards.visualDescription: An adventurer releases a clunky satchel into a gaping abyss, a relieved look on their face.

cards.instructions: Draw a card. Discard a card.
cards.title: Path of Dilemma
cards.flavorText: A choice must be made, even when all paths bear thorns.
cards.visualDescription: At a daunting crossroads, each path fraught with its unique dangers, a wary traveler contemplates their decision.

cards.instructions: Draw two cards.
cards.title: Prospector's Fortune
cards.flavorText: The bold heart uncovers treasures the timid eyes cannot see.
cards.visualDescription: An overflowing coffer of ancient relics and sparkling jewels is discovered in a concealed alcove.

cards.instructions: Discard a card. Shuffle a card from the discard pile back into the deck.
cards.title: Circle of Echoes
cards.flavorText: In the grand weave of time, the old threads intertwine with the new.
cards.visualDescription: A towering tree, its roots reaching deep, stands as a monument to time. Wisps of light float from the ground, symbolizing the return of old memories.

cards.instructions: Draw three cards.
cards.title: Oracle's Enlightenment
cards.flavorText: Enlightenment does not dispel the dark, but it gifts the courage to navigate through it.
cards.visualDescription: An elder sage unfurls a glowing manuscript, casting a light that illuminates cryptic runes on surrounding walls.

cards.instructions: Draw three cards. Discard three cards.
cards.title: Equilibrium's Test
cards.flavorText: Balance is the dance between holding on and letting go.
cards.visualDescription: A poised acrobat maintains a delicate balance on a high wire, juggling three ethereal orbs representing the transient nature of decisions.

cards.instructions: Shuffle your hand into the deck. Re-draw that many cards.
cards.title: Hand of Destiny
cards.flavorText: Sometimes, fate must be reshuffled for new beginnings.
cards.visualDescription: A celestial hand turns an enchanted hourglass, its sands transforming into a cyclone of glyphs and symbols, reshaping the fate of a bystander.

cards.instructions: Discard your hand.
cards.title: Embrace of the Void
cards.flavorText: In surrender to the abyss, the path to rebirth unfolds.
cards.visualDescription: A figure stands at the edge of an inscrutable abyss, their hands open in a gesture of relinquishment and acceptance.

cards.instructions: Discard your hand. Draw a card.
cards.title: Rising of the Phoenix
cards.flavorText: From the cinders of the old, the new takes flight.
cards.visualDescription: A radiant phoenix, its wings ablaze with primal fire, emerges from a pile of discarded tokens, signifying old endeavors.

cards.instructions: Pick any card from the deck. Shuffle the deck. Discard a card.
cards.title: Gambit of the Outlaw
cards.flavorText: The rogue knows that the rules of fate are but a suggestion.
cards.visualDescription: A wily rogue with a mischievous smile deftly pulls a glowing glyph from a spiraling constellation of symbols, scattering the rest.

cards.instructions: Draw three cards. Put one in your hand, one in the discard pile, and one on top of the deck.
cards.title: Mystic's Revelation
cards.flavorText: Beneath the surface of the cryptic lies the truth, waiting to be unveiled.
cards.visualDescription: An enigmatic oracle gazes into a shimmering orb, three prophetic visions hovering within, each signifying a different fate.

cards.instructions: Shuffle the discard pile into the deck.
cards.title: King's Resurgence
cards.flavorText: History, once discarded, often resurfaces to shape the journey anew.
cards.visualDescription: A majestic king stands before a celestial gate, his command bringing forth a swirling storm of historical remnants blending into the current.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. On an even number, draw a card. On an odd number, discard a card.
cards.title: Caprice of Fortune
cards.flavorText: The tide of fortune ebbs and flows, guided by unseen forces.
cards.visualDescription: A majestic pendulum, imbued with arcane energy, oscillates in an ancient tower, casting ever-changing shadows indicative of fortune's fickleness.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. On an even number, gain a fate point. On an odd number, lose a fate point.
cards.title: Destiny's Fulcrum
cards.flavorText: Every spin of destiny's wheel teeters on the edge of the fulcrum.
cards.visualDescription: An ethereal scale levitates in a celestial void, a luminescent point shimmering on one side and a dim one on the other, symbolizing the precarious balance of fate.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll a 1 or a 2, gain a power point. If you roll a 3 or a 4, gain a fate point. If you roll a 5 or a 6, draw a card.
cards.title: Circlet of Prophecy
cards.flavorText: Through the circlet, the threads of destiny weave myriad outcomes.
cards.visualDescription: A mystical circlet, adorned with arcane symbols, hovers over a cosmic backdrop. Beneath it, ethereal dice roll, their faces glowing with potential outcomes.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. On an even number, gain that many power points. On an odd number, lose that many fate points.
cards.title: Equilibrium of the Cosmos
cards.flavorText: Within the cosmos, every action ripples through the fabric of existence.
cards.visualDescription: A celestial scale is suspended amidst the cosmos, one side holding radiant power points, the other, dwindling fate points, representing the cosmic balance at stake.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. Draw that many cards. Shuffle that many cards from your hand into the deck.
cards.title: Rhythms of Fortuity
cards.flavorText: The drumbeat of fate resounds, shaping the symphony of chance.
cards.visualDescription: An ancient drum, pounded by unseen forces, sends ripples through a serene pool, while cards float and swirl in the rhythmic cadence.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. Lose that many fate points. Lose that many power points. Draw that many cards.
cards.title: Fractured Continuum
cards.flavorText: As destiny unravels, fragments of chance and power scatter to the winds.
cards.visualDescription: A temporal vortex pulls at the threads of power and fate, cards slipping through the fractures and spiraling towards an unknown abyss.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. Gain that many fate points. Gain that many power points. Discard that many cards.
cards.title: Celestial Resurgence
cards.flavorText: In the heart of the cosmos, the equilibrium of energies is perpetually renewed.
cards.visualDescription: Constellations converge in a celestial dance, their radiant energies igniting a shower of stardust that reabsorbs dissipating cards, symbolizing the cyclical rejuvenation of fate and power.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. On an even number, draw that many cards. On an odd number, shuffle that many cards from the discard pile into the deck.
cards.title: Reverberations of Fate
cards.flavorText: Fate's echoes whisper of what was and hint at what may yet be.
cards.visualDescription: Ghostly apparitions of past actions manifest as cards, reborn from the abyss, and get reshuffled into the cosmic deck, embodying the cyclical dance of fate.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than your current power total, gain a power point and reroll. If you roll lower than your current power total, lose three power points.
cards.title: Conundrum of Might
cards.flavorText: In the realm of power, fortune can be a formidable ally or a fierce adversary.
cards.visualDescription: A metaphysical scale teeters on the edge, its balance threatened by glowing power points and a diminishing power symbol, reflecting the risky dance of strength.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll the same number as your current power total, draw twice that number of cards. If you roll a different number than your current power total, lose twice that many power points.
cards.title: Cycles of Dominance
cards.flavorText: The relentless tides of power transform into ebbs and surges at fate's whim.
cards.visualDescription: A tempestuous sea mirrors the tumultuous shifts of power, with cards caught in the crest of the wave, symbolizing the high stakes of the roll.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll a 1, 2, or 3, lose a power point for each card in your hand. If you roll a 4, 5, or 6, gain a power point for each card in your hand.
cards.title: Destiny's Grasp
cards.flavorText: The future molds itself within your grip, guided by fate's dice.
cards.visualDescription: A celestial hand holds a group of star-etched cards, their glow matching the shimmering dice floating above, hinting at potential power fluctuations.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll a 1, 2, or 3, lose a fate point for each card in your hand. If you roll a 4, 5, or 6, gain a fate point for each card in your hand.
cards.title: Touch of the Fates
cards.flavorText: Your destiny is intimately entwined with the cards fate deals you.
cards.visualDescription: A hand, bathed in ethereal light, clutches a deck of cards. A gossamer thread of energy connects each card with the hand, reflecting the intimate dance of fate and chance.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll a 1, set your power to 12. If you roll anything other than a 1, set your power level to 1.
cards.title: Power's Reckoning
cards.flavorText: At the mercy of the die, the magnitude of your might is redefined.
cards.visualDescription: An ominous die, glimmering with cosmic power, hovers above a hand that seems both ready and apprehensive. The scene captures the transformative moment that will redefine power.

cards.instructions: Gain a fate point.
cards.title: Resilience of Valor
cards.flavorText: The inner flame of courage never wavers, even in the deepest darkness.
cards.visualDescription: A blazing heart-shaped fire flickers defiantly, its radiant glow piercing through the surrounding shadows.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 1, gain a fate point. If you roll a 1, lose a power point.
cards.title: Fickle Hand of Chance
cards.flavorText: Fortune's hand capriciously steers the journey, for better or worse.
cards.visualDescription: A spectral hand emerges from a celestial cloud, casting rays of unpredictable light that illuminate both fortunes and perils.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 2, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 3, lose 2 power points.
cards.title: Serenity amidst Trials
cards.flavorText: True tranquility endures, unscathed by the tumultuous trials of destiny.
cards.visualDescription: An image of a tranquil being in meditation, surrounded by blossoming flora, evokes a sense of calm amidst unseen trials.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 3, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 4, lose 3 power points.
cards.title: The Warrior's Stand
cards.flavorText: Strength often blooms from the harshest adversities, standing tall amid the ruins.
cards.visualDescription: A lone warrior, stalwart and undeterred, stands strong amidst a landscape scarred by previous battles.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 4, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 5, lose 4 power points.
cards.title: Currents of Destiny
cards.flavorText: Fate's currents are relentless; they lift you to heights untold or drag you to the depths unseen.
cards.visualDescription: A torrent of cosmic energy flows, capturing a voyager in its midst, elevating or immersing him based on unseen forces.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 5, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 6, lose 5 power points.
cards.title: Endless Confrontation
cards.flavorText: Endurance shapes champions; every trial, a testament to the indomitable spirit.
cards.visualDescription: In a maelstrom of opposing forces, a figure finds equilibrium, embodying the human spirit's relentless resilience.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 6, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 7, lose 6 power points.
cards.title: Crown of Resilience
cards.flavorText: Within the heart's unwavering resolve, the dwindling spark of power finds resurgence.
cards.visualDescription: A majestic crown, emblazoned with symbols of resilience, hovers above a heart-shaped flame, heralding the rekindling of power.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 7, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 8, lose 7 power points.
cards.title: Life's Resonance
cards.flavorText: The heart's rhythmic pulse, a dance with fate, awakens dormant might.
cards.visualDescription: A heartbeat's vibrant pulse radiates energy, affecting surrounding symbols of potential, showcasing the rhythm's transformative influence.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 8, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 9, lose 8 power points.
cards.title: Gate of Trials
cards.flavorText: A solemn threshold demands passage, testing the strength of one's spirit.
cards.visualDescription: A grand archway adorned with heart motifs stands before a traveller, his passage decided by unseen determinants.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 9, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 10, lose 9 power points.
cards.title: Chains of Resolve
cards.flavorText: Bound by passion, the heart's fire casts light upon the boundaries of your might.
cards.visualDescription: A barrier of heart-shaped links surrounds a figure, with the intensity of internal flames ebbing and flowing, mirroring unseen impacts.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 10, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 11, lose 10 power points.
cards.title: Brave Gambit
cards.flavorText: A daring wager with destiny; the heart's gamble can lead to great victories or painful losses.
cards.visualDescription: A heart-themed gaming table hosts spectral pieces, symbolizing the potential risks and rewards of this daring venture.

cards.instructions: Roll for fate. If you roll higher than 11, gain a fate point. If you roll lower than 12, lose 11 power points.
cards.title: Regalia of Renewal
cards.flavorText: Through resilience, the heart breathes life into faltering embers of strength.
cards.visualDescription: A regal crown, gleaming with symbols of courage and vitality, cradles a heart-shaped flame, illustrating the revival of dwindling might.

cards.instructions: Lose 12 power points.
cards.title: Valiant Offering
cards.flavorText: In the face of adversity, the strength of sacrifice becomes the fuel for the inner fire.
cards.visualDescription: A burning heart-shaped flame fiercely radiates light, even as surrounding symbols of power fade, underscoring the transformative nature of sacrifice.

cards.instructions: Gain a power point
cards.title: Emanation of Might
cards.flavorText: The fountainhead of fortitude begins to surge.
cards.visualDescription: A mystic geyser radiates vitality, an outstretched hand reaches to touch the source, manifesting the embodiment of burgeoning power.

cards.instructions: Gain a fate point
cards.title: Benevolence of Destiny
cards.flavorText: The hand of providence extends its benevolent touch.
cards.visualDescription: A celestial palm descends from the ether, bestowing a glowing destiny point, reciprocated by a mortal hand reaching upwards, signifying alignment with the course of destiny.

cards.instructions: Sacrifice a fate point. Gain a power point.
cards.title: Arcane Transaction
cards.flavorText: The equilibrium of might is crafted through relinquishment.
cards.visualDescription: A swirling nexus manifests the exchange of destiny for strength, their energies merging in a brilliant fusion of ethereal hues.

cards.instructions: Sacrifice a power point. Gain a fate point.
cards.title: Invigorating Revival
cards.flavorText: The potency of relinquishment fosters the ascent of destiny.
cards.visualDescription: A waning symbol of might fades, as a luminous destiny point emerges from its ashes, encapsulating the transformative essence of surrender on destiny's path.

cards.instructions: Gain two power points.
cards.title: Amplified Ascendancy
cards.flavorText: The influx of vitality kindles the flame of dominance.
cards.visualDescription: Sparks of might ricochet between twin points, demonstrating the surge in strength and the electrifying tension of newfound power.

cards.instructions: Gain two fate points.
cards.title: Destiny's Confluence
cards.flavorText: The intertwining strands of fortune fuel destiny's ascension.
cards.visualDescription: A myriad of converging paths unify at a central hub, where twin destiny points materialize, signifying the fusion of potentialities and their impact on one's course.

cards.instructions: Sacrifice two fate points. Gain three power points.
cards.title: Equitable Relinquishment
cards.flavorText: The pendulum of relinquishment swings in favor of might.
cards.visualDescription: An antique scale, destiny points weighing down one pan and power points the other, tips towards might as destiny dwindles, demonstrating the essential sacrifices on the path to greatness.

cards.instructions: Sacrifice two power points. Gain three fate points.
cards.title: Destiny's Resurgence
cards.flavorText: The resurgence of destiny replenishes the receding wellspring of might.
cards.visualDescription: A fading symbol of might rekindles as three vibrant destiny points burst forth, portraying the rejuvenation of fortune and the metamorphosis of surrender into revitalized power.

cards.instructions: If you have an even number of fate points, gain a power point. If you have an odd number of fate points, lose a power point.
cards.title: Fickle Equilibrium
cards.flavorText: The capricious ballet of destiny teeters on the verge of might's abyss.
cards.visualDescription: A precarious balance beam wavers between destiny and power, with one's current fortune and strength represented on opposing ends, underscoring the delicate balance between the two.

cards.instructions: Sacrifice all of your fate points. Gain that many power points.
cards.title: Destiny's Alchemy
cards.flavorText: The surrender of destiny births boundless might.
cards.visualDescription: A torrent of destiny points transmutes into a hailstorm of power points, embodying the mystical transformation of fortune into raw energy.

cards.instructions: if you have an even number of fate points, set your power to 12. If you have an odd number of fate points, set your fate to 6.
cards.title: Twofold Paradox
cards.flavorText: The cryptic interplay of destiny and might reshapes your essence.
cards.visualDescription: A swirling vortex mirrors the interaction between destiny and might, while two radiant spheres, one embodying fortune and the other power, hover above, indicating the reformation of one's attributes.

cards.instructions: If you have an odd number of fate points, set your power to 1. If you have an even number of fate points, set your fate to 1.
cards.title: Forces United
cards.flavorText: The convergence of destiny and might forges fresh commencement.
cards.visualDescription: Two intertwining rivulets, one embodying destiny and the other power, converge at a central point, where fortune transmutes into might and vice versa, symbolizing the reshaping of one's attributes.

cards.instructions: Set your fate and power to 1.
cards.title: Dawning Potential
cards.flavorText: From the ashes of rebirth, uncharted potential takes flight.
cards.visualDescription: A resplendent phoenix ascends from its ashes, epitomizing the renewal of destiny and power as they reset to their origin.
